thread.section_title: Italki 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Italki 的点评意见 | www.italki.com
thread.title: Neil

author: Neil
title: Neil
text:
Hi All :-)
I am Neil.English.121 at gmail.com on ITALKI. I have been teaching English online with this website for 5 months now (after teaching'for real' since 1984 !!!). ITALKI suits me and the students I teach really well - we both get a lot out of the experience and we have fun. You can book your lessons in advance, as many or as few as you want - you can even re-arrange the times after you have book if you have a problem.
For me ITALKI is the most convenient way to improve your Speaking and Listening skills, but some people use it for higher level exam preparation (I personally don't do this - but other teachers specialise in it).
I strongly recommend ITALKI for Pre- Intermediate to Advanced students - your existing knowledge will allow you to benefit from the 'one on one' experience. Ideally you will have access to a desktop/ netbook/ laptop computer, but a tablet with good internet is okay.
Good luck with your learning and I hope to see you on ITALKI soon - Neil ;-)
